```{r}
Grades = c(17.5, 16.9 , 15.8 , 18.6 , 16.4, 19.2, 17.7,15.4, 20.3,15.7,17.8,18.9,
           14.6,16.7,20.8,18.9,17.5,19.2,16.5,20.5,18.3,16.2,17.5,20.1)

library(pander)
pander(summary(anova))
```
